message: Let's be fair and split the money 60-40. It's a good deal!
Let's be practical, Alice. A 50/50 split ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle. Let's settle on 57-43 and call it a day!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this 52/48 split before inflation makes this whole thing pointless.
